about_the_game:
In the year 2323, aliens enlist Tohm Shlcszark to prevent the end of the world.

Then the World Ends.

A sci-fi adventure RPG that explores themes of the paranormal, philosophy and conspiracy.

Description


Play as Tohm Shlcszark (pronounced tome shulk-zark), the chosen one, on a quest to prevent a second apocalypse. That apocalypse is going to be much worse, probably.

The post-apocalypse, pre-post-apocalypse-apocalypse is home to many strange beings previously unknown to the average citizen, including aliens, mothmen, ghosts, and more. Many factions emerge with conflicting beliefs and goals, but can even one be trusted?

Even when nothing is as it seems, nothing will be as it seems.

Features

  • A robust combat system with different weapons and skills.
  • NPCs with dynamic story-lines that can branch, be ignored, or be violently cut short.
  • A unique world filled with environmental storytelling.
  • More than 20 challenging boss battles.
  • Charm items that provide a variety of effects from simple stat boosts to controlling swarms of moths with your mind.
  • A New Game plus system to retread old ground with your hard-won items and abilities.
  • Several toilets you can stand on.
